name: Pixel Ragdoll: Car Crash Test
description:
Put the pixel ragdoll on the steering wheel of your blocky car and start the demolition madness! Smash car using different obstacles like springboard, landmine or buzzsaw and throw your cube crash test dummy as far as you can!

Enjoy our crash test simulator and join this emergency racing! Your cube driver is at real a pixel crash test dummy, so he won’t be hurt! What unusual instrument of destruction you will choose next time? Get to know with Pixel Ragdoll: Car Crash Test game!

Start the blocky demolition right now! These realistic cube and blocky crash test dummies and mannequins create especially for smash games and traffic accident simulators! Love racing games for kids and car crash games? Check this app and you won’t be disappointed!

Choose the car, choose the obstacle, accelerate and start the ride with our road accident simulators!

Features:

- Opportunity to crash different cars, motorbikes and other vehicles
- Funny pixel crash test dummy
- Unlockable onstacles and instruments of destruction
